meanings.definition: To produce a pattern on metal or other material by engraving or etching.
meanings.sent1: She carefully damascenes the silver bracelet with intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The artist damascenes the sword blade with beautiful floral patterns.
meanings.sent3: The young artist accidentally damascenes his own initials on the metal plate.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for damascening metal surfaces shines through in her latest artwork.
meanings.sent5: The ancient technique of damascening creates stunning patterns on the armor.
